Package de.lergin.laborus.api

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JobAbility
    a ability for a job that can be activated via the /jobs ability command.
    JobAction<T extends JobItem>
    an action that can award some xp and so one it needs to be registered with the JobService in the GamePreInitialization phase: JobService jobService = Sponge.getServiceManager().getRegistration(JobService.class).get().getProvider(); jobService.registerJobAction(Class.class, "nameForTheConfig"); The JobAction need to implement Serializable which is done in the Simplest way by using the @ConfigSerializable annotation.
    JobBonus
    a bonus that will give the player a bonus with a given probability
    JobItem
    an object with that something can happen in a job
    JobService
    The service to register JobBoni, JobActions and JobAbilities.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JobActionState
    the states of a JobAction
